name: Poring Card
description: A cute card with a bouncing pink slime. Grants small bonus to HP.

name: Baphomet Card
description: A legendary card with dark power. Allows the wielder to hit multiple targets.

name: Golden Thief Bug Card
description: This card has powerful magical defenses.

name: Drake Card
description: A pirate's favorite. Strong against large foes.
effect: Increases damage against large monsters by 30%

name: Orc Hero Card
description: Grants incredible strength and physical defense.
